H0.text: Wash hands is the last action a student should perform before leaving the lab area after completing a laboratory activity.

H1.text: Turn off all equipment is the last action that a student should perform before leaving the lab area after completing a laboratory activity.

H2.text: Putting away all glassware is the last action a student should perform before leaving the lab area after completing a laboratory activity.

H3.text: Washing instruments and table tops is the last action a student should perform before leaving the lab area after completing a laboratory activity.
